channel.title: I need help making a client
channel.description:
Ok so here it goes i need help making a client i will give you credits and all also i will pay you! Ok though if this can just be like a client just the basics you can code it if you want but that is not required.
Ok now also i need you to make the client loading pictures and stuff like i tell you to if you can do that. Also when i log in i need it to say Owner Jeremy has logged in ok that is bassicaly it so if you could please help me out :)
If interested tell me your msn and i will ad you and we can talk if this is the wrong section tell me where it belongs please.\
Thank you for taking time to read this
Also helping with coding will be nice and i will give you co owner of my server! And i will pay still :)

item.title: I need help making a client
item.dc:creator: @pancakegod pancakegod
item.description:
@pancakegod wrote:

What do you meen by sided if you meen unfair put Owner Jeremy has logged in then the coders name and then his credits :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2009, 04:06:05 pm[/size][hr]The soul i clicked on link it is to hard for me and yes i know that is preety basic

Read full topic

item.title: I need help making a client
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,310466.0.html - For making a client.

If you want it to say “Owner Jeremy has logged in”, check your initialize method in your client class.

Read full topic
